title: The new replay system
body: Anyone know here recorded replays are saved when using the client replay and recorder system?

replies.body: If you've already left the post game screen, then you may find it in your match history section of the client.  This is currently on the test client, not live!  Hope that helps clear things up!

I'm yet to try this but you could click on "open with" and find League of Legends.exe or the PvP.net launcher and see if it'll launch the game. The replay is not saved as a video file but it's actually a game file. When you are watching your on replay you are considered "in game." I think... Right?
They save to your documents/ League of Legends / Replays{{champion:7}}
